title: THSTI Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 02 Project Research Scientist and Other Posts
description: The Translational Health Science and Technology Institute (THSTI) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 02 DEO, Project Research Scientist Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the BDS, B.Pharm, B.Sc, MBBS, BVSC, BAMS, BUMS, BHMS, and D.Pharm can grab this chance and apply for the THSTI Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Inter...
